title: Heart Rate Love Tester
summary: This is the Love Tester using the heart-rate sensor on Android Wear.
developerAddress: 東京都目黒区鷹番3-6-8 TSビル2F
description: Heart Rate Love Tester is fun app using the heart-rate sensor on Android Wear.This app will detect the heart rate increases when you feel butterflies in the stomach.This app is Free! Enjoy please with your friends and colleagues and family!
descriptionHTML:
Heart Rate Love Tester is fun app using the heart-rate sensor on Android Wear.
This app will detect the heart rate increases when you feel butterflies in the stomach.

This app is Free! Enjoy please with your friends and colleagues and family!
